successes.title: JUMP Cable by Native Union
successes.description: The simplest ideas are the best: Cable + Battery + Intelligent Circuitry = JUMP. The first charging solution that fits your lifestyle.

Pledges.description: Stay in the loop: Pledge $1 or more and you will receive exclusive updates on JUMP's development. Every little bit helps - we can't thank you enough for your support.
Super Early Bird: Receive one (1) JUMP. Choose from Lightning or Micro-USB versions at 40% off the future retail price. Shipping is included for US backers.
Early Bird: Receive one (1) JUMP. Choose from Lightning or Micro-USB versions at 30% off the future retail price. Shipping is included for US backers.
RECHARGED Early Bird: Receive one (1) JUMP. Choose from Lightning or Micro-USB versions at 30% off the future retail price. Shipping is included for US backers.
JUMPstarter: Receive one (1) JUMP. Choose from Lightning or Micro-USB versions at 20% off the future retail price. Shipping is included for US backers.
